str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Inclination, readiness, eagerness, willingness, promptness. From prothumos; predisposition, i.e. Alacrity.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.
A Macedon, i.e. Inhabitant of Macedonia.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Last year, a year ago. Adverb from peras; the by-gone, i.e. last year.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To prepare; mid: I prepare, make preparations. From para and a derivative of skeuos; to furnish aside, i.e. Get ready.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From zeo; properly, heat, i.e. 'zeal' (figuratively, of God), or an enemy, malice).

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To stir up, arouse to anger, provoke, irritate, incite. From a presumed prolonged form of eris; to stimulate.

word: most [ of them to do likewise ].
str2: Or neuter pleion, or pleon comparative of polus; more in quantity, number, or quality; also the major portion.
